page.title: 09Industry contd
page.content:
Shipbuilding has been the operation carried on at the yard of James and Stone. Here a variety of small vessels have been constructed. The range of work has gone from small coasting cargo ships ,fishing boats and similar craft for civilian customers to tank landing craft, fast patrol boats and air-sea rescue boats for military use by a variety of countries and governments.
In the field of Boatbuilding there are a number of workshops, mainly using glass fibre laminates. The products range from cabin cruisers to day boats,fast motor boats ( mostly of outboard power supply. ) to small tenders.
